data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Baghdad, Iraq to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baghdad, Iraq
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 14,760 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Baghdad, Iraq and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Baghdad, Iraq.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Gurani, Hawrami people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Baghdad, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Baghdad who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Baghdad, Iraq has a population of 7,216,000.

We estimate Baghdad has 14,760 people who might know Jesus, 82,032 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,119,207 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 488 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 14,760 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
